text: de Bertier de Sauvigny is an aristocratic French surname. People with that surname include: *Ferdinand de Bertier de Sauvigny (1782–1864), French politician. *Guillaume de Bertier de Sauvigny (1912–2004), French historian. *Jean de Bertier de Sauvigny (1877–1926), French politician. Category:Surnames of French origin
title: De Bertier de Sauvigny
